snippet: The host of the Summer Games capped a fortnight of athletic achievements with a jukebox collection of songs and a marathon display of endearingly wacky stagecraft.
abstract: London extinguishes the Olympic torch, capping two weeks of athletic achievements with a jukebox collection of songs and a marathon display of endearingly wacky stagecraft in the closing ceremony; the three-hour farewell mashes up theater, acrobats, fashion and a few generations of musical idols.
lead_paragraph: The host of the Summer Games capped a fortnight of athletic achievements with a jukebox collection of songs and a marathon display of endearingly wacky stagecraft.

headline.seo: A Distinctly British Show Closes Olympics
